de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util

Class DisplayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util.DisplayUtil

  • public final class DisplayUtil
extends Object
    An utility class, which offers methods for calculations, depending on the device's display metrics.
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      static int convertDpToPixels(Context context, int dp)
      Converts a dp value to a pixel value.

      Converts a pixel value to a dp value.

    • Method Detail

      • convertPixelsToDp

        public static int convertPixelsToDp(Context context,
                    int pixels)
        Converts a pixel value to a dp value.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used to retrieve the device's display metrics, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        pixels - The pixel value, which should be converted, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The calculated dp value as an Integer value. The value may be rounded

      • convertDpToPixels

        public static int convertDpToPixels(Context context,
                    int dp)
        Converts a dp value to a pixel value.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used to retrieve the device's display metrics, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        dp - The dp value, which should be converted, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The calculated pixel value as an Integer value. The value may be rounded
